publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4296 Robin Harper: Inspiring Volunteers of the Year 2009—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement by Volunteer Centre Edinburgh of its Inspiring Volunteering Awards 2009 as part of Volunteers’ Week 2009; congratulates Joan Alexander, a citizen advocate for Partners in Advocacy, for being named as Edinburgh’s Inspiring Volunteer of the Year 2009; recognises the hard work and dedication of those people who freely give up their time to contribute to society through volunteering; acknowledges that almost one third of Edinburgh residents have given their time without pay to a charitable or voluntary organisation or club in the last year, and recognises the positive difference that volunteers make to the city of Edinburgh and its people.
S3M-4296 Inspiring Volunteers of the Year 2009 (lodged on 2 June 2009) Kenneth Gibson*, Cathy Peattie*, Alasdair Allan*, Mike Pringle*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Jackie Baillie*, Malcolm Chisholm*
S3M-4296 Inspiring Volunteers of the Year 2009 (lodged on 2 June 2009) Bill Kidd*, Ken Macintosh*, Stuart McMillan*, Patrick Harvie*

S3M-4296 Robin Harper: Inspiring Volunteers of the Year 2009—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement by Volunteer Centre Edinburgh of its Inspiring Volunteering Awards 2009 as part of Volunteers’ Week 2009; congratulates Joan Alexander, a citizen advocate for Partners in Advocacy, for being named as Edinburgh’s Inspiring Volunteer of the Year 2009; recognises the hard work and dedication of those people who freely give up their time to contribute to society through volunteering; acknowledges that almost one third of Edinburgh residents have given their time without pay to a charitable or voluntary organisation or club in the last year, and recognises the positive difference that volunteers make to the city of Edinburgh and its people. Supported by: Kenneth Gibson, Cathy Peattie, Alasdair Allan, Mike Pringle, Shirley-Anne Somerville, Jackie Baillie, Malcolm Chisholm, Bill Kidd, Ken Macintosh, Stuart McMillan, Patrick Harvie, Jack McConnell*, Des McNulty*
S3M-4296 Inspiring Volunteers of the Year 2009 (lodged on 2 June 2009) Pauline McNeill*
S3M-4296 Inspiring Volunteers of the Year 2009 (lodged on 2 June 2009) Hugh O’Donnell*
S3M-4296 Inspiring Volunteers of the Year 2009 (lodged on 2 June 2009) Karen Whitefield*
S3M-4296 Inspiring Volunteers of the Year 2009 (lodged on 2 June 2009) Tom McCabe*
